full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title (English, French)**

* ITT_W6898-240660_A-Heating System Inspection And Repair of Armouries Various Locations, N.B.
* IAS_W6898-240660_A- Inspection et réparation du système de chauffage des manèges militaires à divers endroits, N.-B.

**Reference Number**

* WS4414839411-Doc4419344981

**Amendment Information**

* Amendment Number: 1
* Amendment Date: 2024-02-08

**Tender Details**

* Solicitation Number: WS4414839411
* Publication Date: 2024-01-30
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-15T14:00:00
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)

**Contract Information**

* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

**Opportunity Information**

* UNSPSC: 72151003, 72151206
* UNSPSC Description: 
	+ Heating system maintenance and repair service
	+ HVAC heating system construction service
* Procurement Category: *CNST

**Other Information**

* Notice Type: Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)
* Procurement Method: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)
* Selection Criteria: Prix le plus bas (Lowest Price)
* Trade Agreements: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: *New Brunswick

**Contracting Entity Information**

* Name: 
	+ (English) Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ (French) Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* Address:
	+ 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	+ Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* Contact:
	+ Name: Bryant, Gary (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Additional Information**

* Estimated Cost: $100,001 - $500,000
* Description: 
	+ The work under this Service Contract covers the furnishing of all labour, material, tools and equipment required to provide the following at Newcastle, Bathurst and Campbellton Armouries:
	+ Weekly Heating
